reviews.title: Fabulous Tchaikana
reviews.text: The Tchaikana is the most tranquil, relaxing riad to escape from the busy frantic atmosphere of marrakech, it is situated in the heart of the medina in walking distance from all sites of interest. Delphine and her staff were incredibly hospitable, informative and friendly we would definitely recommend a stay here to anyone who enjoys a chilled, intimate, calm atmosphere. The riad is spotlessly clean. Excellent value. Will definitely go back.
Lovely riad closed to the Souks of Marrakech;
reviews.title: the place to stay in Marrakech !!

reviews.text: you do not feel staying at a hotel but at a friend's place with a Premium service.
reviews.title: Great stay, bit noisy rooms

reviews.text: Our suite was about 60 sqm !! with designed and well done decoration. Value for money!
reviews.title: Great atmosphere

reviews.text: Tchaikana is definately worth the money. Clean, nicely decorated big rooms and an overall friendly atmosphere. Breakfast on the roof is a fantastic way to start the day and the owner is very willing to answer all questions. The whole staff is nice and helpful, so you really feel welcome.
reviews.title: Lovely and great value - a gem.
An Oasis!
reviews.text: The only thing I found a pity was that the rooms on the ground floor are not very insulated, so if you want to have a private conversation, you need to whisper. Same thing goes the other way around, when people in the lounge are talking, and you want to take a siesta. But you can just ask for a room on the first floor and that will fix the problem.
